titles.title: Enhancing Security for Military Personnel Act of 2015
A bill to enhance the security of military personnel at United States military installations and operating locations.
Enhancing Security for Military Personnel Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Security for Military Personnel Act of 2015
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to: (1) submit to Congress a plan to enhance security of military personnel at DOD installations in the United States; and (2) implement the plan recommendations within 90 days after enactment of this Act, and after briefing Congress.
